A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just like a 3 am drunken kebab that is dropped on the floor outside the shop\, there was so much excitement and then so much disappointment. Rivals the prequel in cringe worthy moments. WTF is up with leia turning into some sort of space superman? Plot timing all wrong and the sub story with fin was dreadful and felt crammed in. So bad it inspired me to sign up to rotten tomatoes just to leave a review.
